function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased movement of people and goods may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks, with a disproportionate effect on vulnerable communities and ethnic groups.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, promoting vaccination, and encouraging responsible travel behavior.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, automated sanitation systems, and travel tracking apps for contact tracing.","People":"General public, vulnerable communities, and ethnic groups.","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, and transportation authorities."}]}
